verses.text: \w After|strong="G3326"\w* \w this|strong="G5023"\w* there \w was|strong="G2258"\w* a \w feast|strong="G1859"\w* of the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* went \w up|strong="G0305"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* there \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w* \w by|strong="G1909"\w* the \w sheep|strong="G4262"\w* \add market\add* a \w pool|strong="G2861"\w*, which is \w called|strong="G1951"\w* in the Hebrew \w tongue|strong="G1447"\w* \w Bethesda|strong="G0964"\w*, \w having|strong="G2192"\w* \w five|strong="G4002"\w* \w porches|strong="G4745"\w*.

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w lay|strong="G2621"\w* \w a|strong="G4128"\w* \w great|strong="G4183"\w* \w multitude|strong="G4128"\w* of impotent \w folk|strong="G0770"\w*, of \w blind|strong="G5185"\w*, \w halt|strong="G5560"\w*, \w withered|strong="G3584"\w*, waiting \w for|strong="G1551"\w* the \w moving|strong="G2796"\w* of the \w water|strong="G5204"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* an \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* went \w down|strong="G2597"\w* at a \w certain|strong="G2596"\w* \w season|strong="G2540"\w* \w into|strong="G1722"\w* the \w pool|strong="G2861"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w troubled|strong="G5015"\w* the \w water|strong="G5204"\w*: \w whosoever|strong="G3588"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* \w first|strong="G4413"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* the \w troubling|strong="G5016"\w* of the \w water|strong="G5204"\w* stepped \w in|strong="G1684"\w* was \w made|strong="G1096"\w* \w whole|strong="G5199"\w* \w of|strong="G3553"\w* \w whatsoever|strong="G1221"\w* \w disease|strong="G3553"\w* he \w had|strong="G2722"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* a \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w*, which \w had|strong="G2192"\w* an \w infirmity|strong="G0769"\w* \w thirty|strong="G5144"\w* and \w eight|strong="G3638"\w* \w years|strong="G2094"\w*.

\w When|strong="G1492"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w him|strong="G5126"\w* \w lie|strong="G2621"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w knew|strong="G1097"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he had \w been|strong="G2192"\w* \w now|strong="G2235"\w* a \w long|strong="G4183"\w* \w time|strong="G5550"\w* \add in that case\add*, he \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Wilt thou|strong="G2309"\+w* \+w be made|strong="G1096"\+w* \+w whole|strong="G5199"\+w*?\wj*

The impotent \w man|strong="G0770"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Sir|strong="G2962"\w*, I \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w*, \w when|strong="G3752"\w* the \w water|strong="G5204"\w* is \w troubled|strong="G5015"\w*, \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w put|strong="G0906"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w pool|strong="G2861"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w while|strong="G3739"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* am \w coming|strong="G2064"\w*, \w another|strong="G0243"\w* steppeth \w down|strong="G2597"\w* \w before|strong="G4253"\w* \w me|strong="G1700"\w*.

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Rise|strong="G1453"\+w*, \+w take up|strong="G0142"\+w* \+w thy|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w bed|strong="G2895"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w walk|strong="G4043"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w immediately|strong="G2112"\w* the \w man|strong="G0444"\w* was \w made|strong="G1096"\w* \w whole|strong="G5199"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* took \w up|strong="G0142"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w bed|strong="G2895"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w walked|strong="G4043"\w*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w on|strong="G1722"\w* the \w same|strong="G1565"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* the \w sabbath|strong="G4521"\w*.

¶ The \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* unto him that was \w cured|strong="G2323"\w*, It \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the sabbath \w day|strong="G4521"\w*: it \w is|strong="G1832"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w lawful|strong="G1832"\w* for \w thee|strong="G4671"\w* to \w carry|strong="G0142"\w* \add thy\add* \w bed|strong="G2895"\w*.

He \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, He that \w made|strong="G4160"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w* \w whole|strong="G5199"\w*, the \w same|strong="G1565"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w me|strong="G3427"\w*, Take \w up|strong="G0142"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w bed|strong="G2895"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w walk|strong="G4043"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* asked \w they|strong="G2065"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w What|strong="G5101"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* that which \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w thee|strong="G4671"\w*, Take \w up|strong="G0142"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w bed|strong="G2895"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w walk|strong="G4043"\w*?

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* he that was \w healed|strong="G2390"\w* \w wist|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w who|strong="G5101"\w* it \w was|strong="G2076"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* had conveyed himself \w away|strong="G1593"\w*, a \w multitude|strong="G3793"\w* \w being|strong="G5607"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \add that\add* \w place|strong="G5117"\w*.

\w Afterward|strong="G3326"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w findeth|strong="G2147"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w temple|strong="G2411"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Behold|strong="G1492"\+w*, \+w thou art made|strong="G1096"\+w* \+w whole|strong="G5199"\+w*: \+w sin|strong="G0264"\+w* \+w no more|strong="G3371"\+w*, \+w lest|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w a worse|strong="G5501"\+w* \+w thing|strong="G5100"\+w* \+w come|strong="G1096"\+w* \+w unto thee|strong="G4671"\+w*.\wj*

The \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w departed|strong="G0565"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w told|strong="G0312"\w* the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* it \w was|strong="G2076"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, which had \w made|strong="G4160"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w whole|strong="G5199"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w therefore|strong="G1223"\w* \w did|strong="G1377"\w* the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w persecute|strong="G1377"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w sought|strong="G2212"\w* to \w slay|strong="G0615"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* he had \w done|strong="G4160"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w* \w on|strong="G1722"\w* the sabbath \w day|strong="G4521"\w*.

¶ \w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w My|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w Father|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w worketh|strong="G2038"\+w* \+w hitherto|strong="G0737"\+w*, \+w and I|strong="G2504"\+w* \+w work|strong="G2038"\+w*.\wj*

\w Therefore|strong="G1223"\w* the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w sought|strong="G2212"\w* the \w more|strong="G3123"\w* to \w kill|strong="G0615"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G3089"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w* had \w broken|strong="G3089"\w* the \w sabbath|strong="G4521"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3004"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* was \w his|strong="G2398"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w*, \w making|strong="G4160"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w equal|strong="G2470"\w* with \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Verily|strong="G0281"\+w*, \+w verily|strong="G0281"\+w*, \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w The Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w can|strong="G1410"\+w* \+w do|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w nothing|strong="G3762"\+w* \+w of|strong="G0575"\+w* \+w himself|strong="G1438"\+w*, \+w but|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w what|strong="G5100"\+w* \+w he seeth|strong="G0991"\+w* \+w the Father|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w do|strong="G4160"\+w*: \+w for|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w what things|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w soever|strong="G0302"\+w* \+w he|strong="G1565"\+w* \+w doeth|strong="G4160"\+w*, \+w these|strong="G5023"\+w* \+w also|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w doeth|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w the Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w likewise|strong="G3668"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w For|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w the Father|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w loveth|strong="G5368"\+w* \+w the Son|strong="G5207"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w sheweth|strong="G1166"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w all things|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w himself|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w doeth|strong="G4160"\+w*: \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w he will shew|strong="G1166"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w greater|strong="G3173"\+w* \+w works|strong="G2041"\+w* \+w than these|strong="G5130"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w ye|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w may marvel|strong="G2296"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w For|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w as|strong="G5618"\+w* \+w the Father|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w raiseth up|strong="G1453"\+w* \+w the dead|strong="G3498"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w quickeneth|strong="G2227"\+w* \+add them\+add*; \+w even|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w so|strong="G3779"\+w* \+w the Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w quickeneth|strong="G2227"\+w* \+w whom|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w he will|strong="G2309"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w For|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w the Father|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w judgeth|strong="G2919"\+w* \+w no man|strong="G3762"\+w*, \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w hath committed|strong="G1325"\+w* \+w all|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w judgment|strong="G2920"\+w* \+w unto the Son|strong="G5207"\+w*:\wj*

\wj  \+w That|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w all|strong="G3956"\+w* \+add men\+add* \+w should honour|strong="G5091"\+w* \+w the Son|strong="G5207"\+w*, \+w even as|strong="G2531"\+w* \+w they honour|strong="G5091"\+w* \+w the Father|strong="G3962"\+w*. \+w He that honoureth|strong="G5091"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w the Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w honoureth|strong="G5091"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w the Father|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w which hath sent|strong="G3992"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Verily|strong="G0281"\+w*, \+w verily|strong="G0281"\+w*, \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w He that|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w heareth|strong="G0191"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w word|strong="G3056"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w believeth|strong="G4100"\+w* \+w on him that sent|strong="G3992"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w*, \+w hath|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w everlasting|strong="G0166"\+w* \+w life|strong="G2222"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w shall|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w come|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w condemnation|strong="G2920"\+w*; \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w is passed|strong="G3327"\+w* \+w from|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w death|strong="G2288"\+w* \+w unto|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w life|strong="G2222"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Verily|strong="G0281"\+w*, \+w verily|strong="G0281"\+w*, \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w The hour|strong="G5610"\+w* \+w is coming|strong="G2064"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w now|strong="G3568"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w*, \+w when|strong="G3753"\+w* \+w the dead|strong="G3498"\+w* \+w shall hear|strong="G0191"\+w* \+w the voice|strong="G5456"\+w* \+w of the Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w*: \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w they that hear|strong="G0191"\+w* \+w shall live|strong="G2198"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w For|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w as|strong="G5618"\+w* \+w the Father|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w hath|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w life|strong="G2222"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w himself|strong="G1438"\+w*; \+w so|strong="G3779"\+w* \+w hath he given|strong="G1325"\+w* \+w to the Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w to have|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w life|strong="G2222"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w himself|strong="G1438"\+w*;\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w hath given|strong="G1325"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w authority|strong="G1849"\+w* \+w to execute|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w judgment|strong="G2920"\+w* \+w also|strong="G2532"\+w*, \+w because|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w he is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w the Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of man|strong="G0444"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Marvel|strong="G2296"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w at this|strong="G5124"\+w*: \+w for|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w the hour|strong="G5610"\+w* \+w is coming|strong="G2064"\+w*, \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the which|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w all|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w that are|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the graves|strong="G3419"\+w* \+w shall hear|strong="G0191"\+w* \+w his|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w voice|strong="G5456"\+w*,\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w shall come forth|strong="G1607"\+w*; \+w they that have done|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w good|strong="G0018"\+w*, \+w unto|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the resurrection|strong="G0386"\+w* \+w of life|strong="G2222"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w they that have done|strong="G4238"\+w* \+w evil|strong="G5337"\+w*, \+w unto|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the resurrection|strong="G0386"\+w* \+w of damnation|strong="G2920"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w can|strong="G1410"\+w* \+w of|strong="G0575"\+w* \+w mine own self|strong="G1683"\+w* \+w do|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w nothing|strong="G3762"\+w*: \+w as|strong="G2531"\+w* \+w I hear|strong="G0191"\+w*, \+w I judge|strong="G2919"\+w*: \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w my|strong="G1699"\+w* \+w judgment|strong="G2920"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w just|strong="G1342"\+w*; \+w because|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w I seek|strong="G2212"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w mine own|strong="G1699"\+w* \+w will|strong="G2307"\+w*, \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w the will|strong="G2307"\+w* \+w of the Father|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w which hath sent|strong="G3992"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w If|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w bear witness|strong="G3140"\+w* \+w of|strong="G4012"\+w* \+w myself|strong="G1683"\+w*, \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w witness|strong="G3141"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w true|strong="G0227"\+w*.\wj*

\wj ¶ \+w There is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w another|strong="G0243"\+w* \+w that beareth witness|strong="G3140"\+w* \+w of|strong="G4012"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1700"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w I know|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w the witness|strong="G3141"\+w* \+w which|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w he witnesseth|strong="G3140"\+w* \+w of|strong="G4012"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1700"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w true|strong="G0227"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Ye|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w sent|strong="G0649"\+w* \+w unto|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w John|strong="G2491"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w he bare witness|strong="G3140"\+w* \+w unto the truth|strong="G0225"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w But|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w receive|strong="G2983"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w testimony|strong="G3141"\+w* \+w from|strong="G3844"\+w* \+w man|strong="G0444"\+w*: \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w these things|strong="G5023"\+w* \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w ye|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w might be saved|strong="G4982"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w He|strong="G1565"\+w* \+w was|strong="G2258"\+w* \+w a|strong="G3088"\+w* \+w burning|strong="G2545"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w a shining|strong="G5316"\+w* \+w light|strong="G3088"\+w*: \+w and|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w ye|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w were willing|strong="G2309"\+w* \+w for|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w a season|strong="G5610"\+w* \+w to rejoice|strong="G0021"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w his|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w light|strong="G5457"\+w*.\wj*

\wj ¶ \+w But|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w have|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w greater|strong="G3173"\+w* \+w witness|strong="G3141"\+w* \+w than that of John|strong="G2491"\+w*: \+w for|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w the works|strong="G2041"\+w* \+w which|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w the Father|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w hath given|strong="G1325"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3427"\+w* \+w to|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w finish|strong="G5048"\+w*, \+w the same|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w works|strong="G2041"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w do|strong="G4160"\+w*, \+w bear witness|strong="G3140"\+w* \+w of|strong="G4012"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1700"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w the Father|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w hath sent|strong="G0649"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w*.\wj*
